title: SKUAST Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Field Worker Post
description: Shere Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology Jammu (SKUAST Jammu) has announced the latest notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Field Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the specified last date. For more information, like age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the SKUA...
